description:
Yakitate means "fresh baked", but the word "Japan" is actually a pun - pan means bread in Japanese, so http://anidb.net/ch1591 [Kazuma] is out to make Japan, a unique Japanese bread to compete with the best bread from around the world!
Azuma become obsessed with bread when he was six years old. http://anidb.net/ch1635 [His sister] yelled that their family should start having bread for breakfast sometimes, but http://anidb.net/ch29466 [their grandfather] refused to even consider it, as he would only eat natto, miso soup, and rice for breakfast. Kazuma agreed, saying he didn`t like bread, but his sister kidnaps him and takes him to a bread store to show him the wonders of fresh-baked bread. Not only is Kazuma converted, but the owner discovers that Kazuma has the magical "Hands of the Sun" whose warmth makes them particularly suited to making bread. The owner packs up shop and goes to Tokyo to fulfill his dream of making Japan, but Kazuma continues his bread-baking dream as well, and ends up going to Tokyo himself when he`s sixteen, to compete for a spot at the foremost bread store in Japan - Pantasia!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma Azuma lives in the country and is in a family of rice farmers. When his sister Inaho asks to have bread for bread for breakfast, grandfather Umataro refuses. It’s up to Kazuma to make a bread that will convince him! His journey for Ja-pan starts now!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He`s Here!! The Boy with the Hands of the Sun!
Il est arrivé !! Le garçon aux mains solaires !
Kita zo!! Taiyou no Te o Motsu Shounen!
เด็กหนุ่มผู้มีหัตถ์ตะวัน มาแล้ว!
来たぞっ!! 太陽の手を持つ少年!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma takes the recruitment exam to get accepted into Pantasia, the best bakery in Japan, and he meets the ambitious yet snarky Kyoutaro Kawachi, who is willing to sabotage Kazuma’s dough to win.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maharajah !! Le jour où le mont Fuji est tombé !
Maharajah!! Fuji-san ga Futtekita Hi!
Maharajah!! The Day Mt. Fuji Fell!
วันที่ภูเขาไฟฟูจิหล่น!
マハラジャッ!! 富士山が降ってきた日!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma and Kawachi work together to make the ultimate croissant, Ja-pan #43. But can it stand up against the croissant made by the strongest of the rookies, Kai Suwabara?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Charred!! This Is the Ultimate Claus Swann!?
Complètement cramé !! C’est lui, Kurowa-san ?
Kurokoge! Kore ga Kyuukyoku no Kurowa-san!?
ไหม้ๆดำๆ เนี่ยนะเหรอคุโรวะซังด่านสุดท้าย
黒コゲ!! これが究極の黒輪さん!?

REGULAR.description:
It’s Kazuma and Kawachi’s first day of work at Pantasia’s South Tokyo, but before they can be recognized as true bread artisans, they must satisfy the manager’s request to make a bread that even a horse will eat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brrr !! Faites un pain chevalement bon !
Hihiin!! Umai Pan o Tsukure!
Neigh!! Make Good Grazing Bread!
ฮี้ๆๆ ทำขนมปังม้ากินกันเถอะ!
ヒヒーン!! 馬味いパンを作れ!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma and Kawachi both try and find a way to make a bread that the manager’s horse will eat. Kawachi decides to use oats, while Kazuma makes butter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Not Baaaad!! Ultimate Butter Is the Clincher!
Quel délice !! L’essentiel est dans le beurre !
Umee!! Kimete wa Kyuukyoku no Butter!
แบ่ะๆๆๆ เคล็ดลับอยู่ที่สุดยอดเนย!
美メェ~!! 決め手は究極のバター!

REGULAR.description:
Manager Matsushiro challenges the manager of St. Pierre’s main store, Mokoyama, to a bread battle, which will be broadcast live. Can Kazuma win with his Ja-pan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honten Da!! Odoru Meister!
It`s the Main Store!! The Dancing Meister!
La maison mère !! Meister mène la danse !
มาสเตอร์เต้นรำ จากสาขาใหญ่!
本店だ!! 踊るマイスター!

REGULAR.description:
The bread battle has begun! Mokoyama unveils his ridiculously sweet Kouign Pudding Amman, which the judges give a perfect score! Does Kazuma’s Ja-pan stand a chance?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bikkuri Hattori!! Himitsu no Tare de Henshin ja!
Doc Shock!! Secret Sauce Transformation!
Hattori est surpris !! Une sauce qui rehausse le pain !
อาจารย์ฮัตโตริตกใจ ! แปลงร่างด้วยซ้อสสูตรลับ!
びっくり服部!! 秘密のタレで変身じゃ!

REGULAR.description:
South Tokyo receives their invitations for the Pantasia Rookie Competition, a tournament for all Pantasia newcomers to vie for baking supremacy. After feeling like he can’t match Kazuma, Tsukino helps Kawachi train to acquire the Gauntlets of the Sun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawachi Kai!! Taiyou no Gauntlet!
Kawachi Prime!! The Gauntlets of the Sun!
Kyôsuke nouvelle version !! Les gants solaires !
คาวาจิคนใหม่ กับปลอกแขนตะวัน
河内改!! 太陽のガントレット!

REGULAR.description:
Kawachi is continuing his training, but still hasn’t come up with an idea for what kind of bread he will submit for the contest preliminaries. Will he come up with something in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Won`t Lose!! I`ll Fight Ya with Osaka Bread!
Je ne vais pas perdre !! Le pain d’Osaka me fera gagner !
Makehen!! Oosaka Pan de Shoubu ya!
ไม่ยอมแพ้หรอก จะชนะด้วยขนมปังโอซาก้านี่ล่ะ!
負けへん!! 大阪パンで勝負や!

REGULAR.description:
Both Kazuma and Kawachi have made it past the preliminaries and now the Rookie Competition has officially begun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lever de rideaux !! Le concours des nouveaux !
Sorezore no Kaimaku!! Pantasia Shinjinsen Kaishi!
Their Respective Beginnings!! Pantasia`s Rookie Competition Opens!
เปิดตัวต่างๆกัน! ศึกหน้าใหม่ปังตาเซียเริ่มขึ้นแล้ว!
それぞれの開幕!! パンタジア新人戦開始!

REGULAR.description:
For their first task, Kazuma and Kawachi must make a butter roll… but Kazuma chose the worst possible butter for the assignment! Can he possibly make anything good enough to pass?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des restes !! Kazuma choisit le pire des beurres !
Kuzukasu!! Kazuma ga Eranda Saitei Butter!
Riffraff Scum!! Kazuma Chooses the Worst Butter!
เจ้าพวกห่วยแตก กับ เนยยอดแย่ที่คาสึมะเลือก!
クズカスッ!! 和馬が選んだ最低バター!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma almost faces the end! Will his poor choice of butter disqualify him from the contest already? And, Tsukino comes face to face with her younger sister, Mizuno, who proposes a bet. If Mizuno wins, then Kazuma will have to transfer to her store!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kazuma Failed!? Ultra C to the Rescue!
Kazuma Shikkaku!? Kishikaisei no Ultra C!
Kazuma a-t-il échoué !? La résurrection d’Ultra-C !
คาสึมะจะตกรอบ!? กับการฟื้นคืนชีพด้วยCพิเศษ!
和馬失格!? 起死回生のウトラC!

REGULAR.description:
In this round, Kazuma is up against Mizuno, and he has to make melon bread. The problem? He has no idea how to make melon bread! Can he possibly beat Mizuno, who is not only incredibly skilled, but who also uses premier ingredients?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est prêt !! Le melon pan qui rend gaga !
Hey Omachi!! Melon Pan de Melon Melon!
Order`s Up!! Going Bananas for Melon Bread!
เฮ้ มาแล้วครับ ขนมปังเมล๊อน เมล่อน!
ヘイお待ち!! メロンパンでメロンメロン!

REGULAR.description:
The theme of the next round is Yakisoba bread, and the twist is that challengers this round will cook the yakisoba. Kazuma, however, is a terrible cook, so Mr. Matsushiro recruits an old friend to teach Kazuma and Kawachi about the way of noodles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bimen!! Yakisoba Pan no Otoshiana!
Délicieux ! Le piège du Yakisoba-Pan !
Noodlicious!! The Pitfalls of Yakisoba Bread!
เส้นอาหย่อยยย กับหลุมพรางขนมปังยากิโซบะ!
美麺ーッ!! 焼きそばパンの落とし穴!

REGULAR.description:
Kawachi finds the yakisoba challenge quite easy, but Kazuma can’t get the hang of cooking. Will he be able to think of something in time before he has to face Spencer Henry Hoko, an amazing baker who is renowned for his yakisoba bread?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invincible Team!! Win with Ono no Komachi!
La meilleure des équipes ! On gagnera avec Ono no Komachi !
Saikyou Team!! Onono Komachi-san de Katsu n ja!
สุดยอดทีมแกร่ง ! จะชนะด้วย คุณโอโนโนะ โคมาจิ นี่ล่ะ!
最強チーム!! 小野小町さんで勝つんじゃ!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma is up against Koala, and the theme is to make an “animal” bread. Can Kazuma stand up against the powerful, mysterious Koala? Or will Koala secure victory for Mizuno?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Green Miracle!! Kazuma the Magician!
Le miracle vert ! Kazuma le magicien !
Midori no Kiseki!! Mahou Tsukai Kazuma!
ปาฎิหารย์สีเขียว ! จอมเวทย์คาสึมะ!
ミドリの奇跡!! 魔法使い和馬ッ!

REGULAR.description:
Koala’s bread is a dragon and Kazuma’s bread… is in the shape of a turtle? Which will be victorious?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat décisif ! Le dragon de Koala contre la tortue de Kazuma !
Daikessen!! Koala no Ryuu vs Kazuma no Kame!
The Big Showdown!! Koala`s Dragon vs. Kazuma`s Turtle!
ศึกครั้งใหญ่ มังกรของโคอาล่าปะทะเต่าของคาสึมะ!
大決戦!! コアラの竜vs和馬のカメ!

REGULAR.description:
Tsukino goes to visit her mother’s grave, while Kawachi goes up against Katsuo in the contest. After seeing what Tsukino has lost, the South Tokyo crew makes a vow to win for her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avec toutes nos prières ! Le serment devant la tombe
Inori o Komete!! Bozen no Chikai!
With Our Prayers Behind It!! A Graveside Vow!
ตั้งจิตอธิษฐาน สาบานต่อหน้าหลุมศพ!
祈りをこめて!! 墓前の誓い!

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for the semifinals! Kawachi is up against scientific genius Shigeru Kanmuri. Kawachi is feeling confident, but something seems to be wrong with his dough…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Junkesshou!! Yukino no Hiretsu na Wana!
Demi-finale cauchemardesque ! Le piège infâme de Yukino !
Nightmarish Semifinals!! Yukino`s Dastardly Trap!
ฝันร้ายรอบชิงชนะเลิศ และแผนสกปรกของยูกิโนะ
悪夢の準決勝!! 雪乃の卑劣な罠!

REGULAR.description:
Kawachi’s dough won’t ferment despite his best efforts and he collapses after become exhausted. What could have been the cause? Does South Tokyo stand a chance against such foul play?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukutsu no Toushi!! Gyakkyou o Bane ni Tachi Agare!
Indomitable Fighting Spirit!! Let Adversity Bring You to Your Feet!
Un esprit inébranlable ! Fais face à l`adversité !
ความตั้งใจมุ่งมั่น ลุกยืนหยัดได้บนอุปสรรค!
不屈の闘志!! 逆境をバネに立ち上がれ!

REGULAR.description:
After Kawachi’s horrible defeat, Kazuma vows to avenge him. So Kazuma uses a slab of petalite to make Ja-pan #44, a bread so delicious that the person who eats it will be whisked away to Heaven! Has Kazuma finally gotten serious?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s the Mightiest Bread in the History of Prototypes!! Ja-pan No. 44!
Le meilleur de tous les Ja-pans ! Le Ja-pan n°44 !
Shisaku Shijou Saikyou no Pan!! Japan 44 Gou ja!
ขนมปังที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดในประวัติศาสตร์ เจปังหมายเลข 44!
試作史上最強のパン!! ジャパン44号じゃッ!

REGULAR.description:
Before he faces Suwabara, the strongest of the rookies, Mr. Matsushiro tells Kawachi to go train at St. Andrew’s church. Meanwhile, Yukino breaks Kazuma’s petalite stone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avant la finale ! Une ombre plane sur Kazuma
Kesshousen Chokuzen!! Kazuma ni Semaru Kuroi Kage
The Final Match Is Near!! A Dark Shadow Closes In on Kazuma!
ก่อนการแข่งรอบชิงชนะเลิศกับ เงาดำมืดที่คุกคามอาสึมะ
決勝戦直前!! 和馬に迫る黒い影

REGULAR.description:
Kawachi meets a young nun who teaches him how to make incredible bread and stand up to geniuses! Meanwhile, Kazuma is about to face off against Kanmuri to see who can make the springier bread!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mochi Mochi Taiketsu!! Azuma Kazuma VS Kanmuri Shigeru!
Springy Showdown!! Kazuma Azuma vs. Shigeru Kanmuri!
Une finale élastique ! Kazuma Azuma contre Shigeru Kanmuri !
การเจอกันของความนุ่มเด้ง อาสึมะคาสึมะ ปะทะ คังมุริชิเงรุ
モチモチ対決!! 東和馬VS冠茂!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma is up against Kanmuri! It’s time to see who will win! Their battle is overseen by the illustrious Meister Kirisaki, who gives Kanmuri a perfect score. Can Kazuma hope to win against a scientific genius who graduated from Harvard at a young age?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meister s`envole ! Qui a gagné ?
Sora Tobu Meister!! Katsu no wa Docchi!?
The Flying Meister!! Who Will Win!?
มาสเตอร์เหินฟ้า ฝ่ายไหนจะชนะ
空飛ぶマイスター!! 勝つのはどっち!?

REGULAR.description:
The villainous Yukino, true to her word, destroys Kanmuri’s lab after he loses to Kazuma. Meanwhile, the match between Suwabara and Kawachi is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanyate!! Kawachi, Otoko no Moutokkun!
Quoi ? L`entraînement intensif de Kawachi !
What the-!? Kawachi`s Intensive Manliness Training!
อะไรนะ! คาวาจิฝึกพิเศษแบบลูกผู้ชาย!
なんやてッ!! 河内, 漢の猛特訓!

REGULAR.description:
Kawachi makes “Singing” French bread, while Suwabara rises to the challenge with his “Dancing” French bread. Will this match end with… a draw?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dernier match ! Les pains qui chantent et dansent !
Shinjinsen Saishuu Jiai!! Utatte Odoru France Pan!
The Rookie Competition`s Final Match!! Singing and Dancing French Bread!
ปิดฉากการแข่งศึกหน้าใหม่!! ขนมปังฝรั่งเศสร้องเพลงเต้นรำ!
新人戦最終試合!! 歌って踊るフランスパン!

REGULAR.description:
After the awards ceremony for the contest, the South Tokyo crew return to their store, and Kazuma teaches a kid the joy of cooking bread. Follow along and learn how to make your very own Ja-pan in this episode!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Faisons tous du pain ! Le ja-pan 2 !
Let`s All Make Bread Together!! It`s Ja-pan No. 2!
Let`s Minna de Pan Tsukuri!! Japan 2 Gou ja!
ทุกคนมาทำขนมปังกันเถอะ! เจปังหมายเลข2จ้า
レッツみんなでパン作り!! ジャぱん2号じゃっ!

REGULAR.description:
Though Kawachi has departed for the main store, life has returned to normal for the South Tokyo branch. Or has it? The villainous Yukino is still plotting to take down the South Tokyo store, so Kanmuri proposes a risky plan to save the bakery!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyakuoku no Otoko!? Pantasia Sonbou no Kiki!
L`homme qui valait 10 milliards ! Pantasia est en crise !
The Ten-Billion Yen Man!? Pantasia`s Fate Hangs in the Balance!
บุรุษพันล้าน!? ปังตาเซียวิกฤติแล้ว!
百億の男!? パンタジア存亡の危機!

REGULAR.description:
Yukino hires three specialists from the St. Pierre branch in Kyushu who are able to copy any kind of bread. Can Kazuma’s Black Ja-pan counter their threat and expose Yukino for the villain she is?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Close Attack!! The Birth of Black Ja-pan!
Attaque ! La naissance du black ja-pan !
Hakugeki!! Black Japan Tanjou!
ประชิดจู่โจม! กำเนิดแบล็คเจปัง!
迫撃!! ブラックじゃぱん誕生!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma, Kawachi, and Suwabara depart for France to train under Meister Kirisaki’s younger sister, Sophie. But when they learn that her bakery is being threatened, they decide to help her fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour la France ! Visons la Coupe de Monaco !
Iza France!! Mezase Monaco Cup!
Now, to France!! Aiming for the Monaco Cup!
มุ่งสู่ฝรั่งเศส! เป้าหมายคือโมนาโคคัพ!
いざフランス!! 目指せモナコカップ!

REGULAR.description:
For the Monaco Cup qualifying match, Kawachi proposes that they make a bread modeled after Rodin’s famous sculpture, “The Thinker.” The catch? He has to stay inside the bread sculpture during the competition! Can he possibly make it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Explosive Situation!! The Forbidden Rodin Tactic!
Isshokusokuhatsu!! Kindan no Rodan Sakusen!
Situation explosive ! La plan Rodin interdit !
สถานการณ์ตึงเครียด!! แผนโรแดงต้องห้าม!
一触即発!! 禁断のロダン作戦!

REGULAR.description:
The Monaco Cup has officially begun, and Team Japan’s fate rests on their luck with the roulette. Will they get the ingredients they need? Can they possibly make a bread just with eggs?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Korezo Sekai Level!! Arashi o Yobu Roulette!
This Is Truly World-Class Level!! The Roulette That Brings Chaos!
Voilà le niveau mondial ! La roulette infernale !
นี่แหละระดับโลก รูเล็ทที่เรียกพาย
これぞ世界レベル!! 嵐を呼ぶルーレット!

REGULAR.description:
Things don’t look good for Team Japan. France is a tough contender, and the judge is more interested in explaining his origins than judging the bread! Can Kazuma’s Ja-pan #21 pull through?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3 Ji no Oyatsu!! Japan 21 Gou ja!
3時のおやつ!! ジャぱん21号じゃッ!
Le goûter de 15h ! Le ja-pan 21 !
Three O`Clock Is Snack Time!! This Is Ja-pan #21!
ของว่างตอนตีสาม! เจปังหมายเลข21!

REGULAR.description:
After using a roulette table to determine ingredients, what could possibly come next? How about a slot machine? Suwabara steps up and wins a lot of coins at the slots, but things sound too good to be true… and what’s this about Lu-pan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le lu-pain 3 ! La pain d`épice à la Kai
Lu-pan #3!! Pain d`Epices Kai (Prime)!
Lupan 3 Gou!! Pan De Ebisu Kai!
ลูแปงหมายเลข3 แปงเดอเอปิสไค
ルパン3号! パン・デ・エピス戒(改)!

REGULAR.description:
Spencer Henry Hoko, from the Newcomer Contest, is back and has joined Team America! But why is he working for St. Pierre? Back at the South Tokyo branch, Kanmuri and the others desperately try to keep the store afloat with a demonstration sale!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le monde nous regarde ! Début de la coupe de Monaco !
Sekai ga Chuumoku!! Monaco Cup Honsen Start!
The World`s Watching!! The Monaco Cup Main Event Starts Now!
ทั่วโลกจับตามอง!! โมนาโกคัพรอบจริงสตาร์ท!
世界が注目!! モナコカップ本選スタート!

REGULAR.description:
For the quarterfinals, contestants have to make a bread in less than 60 minutes. Can it be done? Kazuma has the idea to use a microwave, but when Pierrot reveals he absolutely hates them, things don’t look good for Team Japan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Speed Shoubu!! Are de Chin Shite!
Speed Test!! Microwave It!
Épreuve de vitesse ! Passe-le au four à micro-ondes !
แข่งความเร็ว!! ขนมปังไมโครเวฟ!
スピード勝負!! アレでチンしてッ!

REGULAR.description:
The contestants are brought to a tropical paradise and have to make a sweet bread with ingredients found on the island. Things take a turn for the worse though when Kazuma gets caught in a whirlpool! Forget about winning… can they survive?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jeu de survie ! Des boulangers sur une île déserte !
Survival!! Bakers on a Deserted Island!
Survival!! Mujintou no Pan Shokunin!
เซอร์ไววัล! ช่างทำขนมปังบนเกาะร้าง
サバイバル!! 無人島のパン職人!

REGULAR.description:
Team France does the unthinkable and sets fire to the island in the hopes of stripping away Team Japan’s chances of winning. Yuichiki Kirisaki and Chairman Lemay aren’t just out to beat Team Japan… they want them dead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iza Oyoge!! Minami no Shima no Tai-Yaki-kun!
Nage ! Le taiyaki de l`île tropicale !
Now Swim!! Taiyaki of the Southern Island!
ว่ายน้ำเข้า!! ไทยากิคุงแห่งเกาะตอนใต้!
いざ泳げ!! 南の島のタイ焼きくん!

REGULAR.description:
After surviving the incident on the island, Team Japan lives to fight another day. Because the last round’s results were annulled, a rematch will be held in Mexico. But something seems off about those professional skydivers hired for the match…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku e no Dive!! Aratanaru Houryaku!
Le saut de l`enfer ! Un nouveau complot !
The Skydive to Hell! A New Kind of Diabolical Plan!
ดำดิ่งสู่นรก!! แผนร้ายครั้งใหม่!
地獄へのダイブ!! 新たなる謀略!

REGULAR.description:
After rescuing Kazuma and the others, Pierrot leads everyone to an underground lake. He promises everyone that he’ll swim outside and find help, but there’s one problem... he can’t swim! Can Pierrot get out of it, or did he bite off more than he could chew?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grosse erreur de Pierrot ! Comment est le dernier dîner ?
Piero Dai Gosan!! Saigo no Bansan, Oaji wa Ikaga?
Pierrot Makes a Huge Mistake! How Does the Last Supper Taste?
เปียโร่คำนวณพลาดมหันต์!! อาหารค่ำมื้อสุดท้าย รสชาติเป็นไงบ้าง?
ピエロ大誤算!! 最後の晩餐, お味はいかが?

REGULAR.description:
After being rescued from the cave, Kazuma and the others meet the King of Monaco, who apologizes for all of the threats they’ve faced and offers them any ingredient they wish. In exchange though, they must answer his question!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La question du prince ! Qui mange le pain en premier ?
Ou-sama no Shitsumon!! Oishisou na Pan o Saisho ni Tabesaseru no wa?
The King`s Question!! Who Would You First Serve Delicious Bread To?
คำถามของพระราชา!! ขนมปังที่น่าอร่อยจะให้ใครกินคนแรก?
王様の質問!! 美味しそうなパンを最初に食べさせるのは?

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for Team Japan to face against Team France—Kayser! The Kayser brothers reveal their true form, and Gran Kayser has more special abilities than anyone could have imagined! And what’s worse, Kazuma might be disqualified for being late!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiki Kaikai!! Kaizer no Shoutai!
The Weirdoes!! Unmasking Kayser!
Étrange ! La vrai nature des Kayser !
พิสดารพันลึก!! ร่างจริงของไกเซอร์!
奇々怪々!! カイザーの正体!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma arrives in the nick of time and faces off against Gran Kayser. Suwabara’s red bread couldn’t beat Kayser’s blue bread. Will Kazuma’s black bread tip the scales?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eiyou Tappuri !! Sports Pan Taiketsu!
Full of Nutrients!! Sports Bread Showdown!
Nourrissant ! L`épreuve des pains sportifs !
สารอาหารเต็มเปี่ยม!! ศึกขนมปังสปอร์ต!
栄養たっぷり!! スポーツパン対決!

REGULAR.description:
After conquering Team France, Team Japan is feeling confident, but another threat looms overhead: Team America. They’ve faced Spencer Henry Hoko before, but just who are Shadow and Monica?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Menace supersonique ! Le go-pan 97 !
Onsoku no Kyuui!! Gopan 97 Gou!
The Speed of Sound Menace!! Go-pan #97!
คุกคามด้วยความเร็วเสียง!! โกปังหมายเลข97!
音速の脅威!! ごぱん97号!

REGULAR.description:
Suwabara faces off against Monica Adenauer of Team America, who is revealed to be a world-champion patissier! Can he possibly beat her in making an artistic bread?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La La La! (Bare, Bare, Bare!): The Great Bread Battle!
Nue, Nu, Nus ! Le match des pains artistiques !
Ra * Ra * Ra!! Karei Naru Pan Shoubu!
โป๊ๆๆ! ศึกขนมปังสวยงาม!
裸[ラ]・裸[ラ]・裸[ラ]!! 華麗なるパン勝負!

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for the judging! It’s Suwabara’s golden P’ain D’or against Monico’s beautiful five-layered flower bread. Before giving the results though, Pierrot turns himself into the police!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Piero Gosou!? Ai Gagishiri Tsumata Pan!
Pierrot arrêté ? Un pain fait avec amour
The Clown Jailed!? Bread Full of Love!
คุมขังเปียโร่!? ขนมปังที่เปี่ยมด้วยความรัก!
ピエロ護送!? 愛がぎっしり詰まったパン!

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for Kawachi to face off against Spencer Henry Hoko! After learning more about how hard his father worked, Kawachi is more determined than ever to obtain victory! Can he achieve his father’s dreams?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Victoire ! Révolutionne le monde du pain !
Victory! Pan Gyoukai ni Kakumei o!
Victory!! A Revolution in the Bread Industry!
วิคตอรี่! ปฏิวัติวงการขนมปัง
ヴィクトリー!! パン業界に革命を!

REGULAR.description:
Pierrot’s been stabbed! And Detective Conan showed up? What’s going on here? Has Kawachi been accused of murder?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Détective Pierrot ! Une réaction mortelle !
Meitantei Piero!! Inochi o Kaketa Reaction!
The Great Detective Pierrot!! Risking His Life for a Reaction!
นักสืบชื่อดังเปียโร่!! รีแอคชั่นที่เดิมพันด้วยชีวิต!
名探偵ピエロ!! 命をかけたリアクション!

REGULAR.description:
Pierrot is at death’s door and everyone is scrambling to save him! However, he has a rare blood type and no one knows any donors… but what’s this? The King has the same blood type?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retrouvailles VIP ! Heaven Again !
Reunited in the VIP Section!! Heaven Again!
VIP Seki de Saikai!! Heaven Again!
VIP席で再会!! ヘブン・アゲイン!
พบกัน ณ ที่นั่ง VIP!! เฮเว่น.อเกน!

REGULAR.description:
After tragically losing his father, Pierrot still carries on with the contest. But Shadow from Team America promises to reunite Pierrot with his mother with his Go-pan! Can Go-Pan send Pierrot to the Milky Way to meet his mother who died and became a star?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blasting Off into Space!! The Man Who Succeeds Go-pan!
En route vers les étoiles ! L`héritier du go-pan !
Uchuu o Miseru!! Gopan o Tsugu Otoko!
มองเห็นอวกาศ!! ชายผู้สืบทอดโกปัง!
宇宙を魅せる!! ゴぱんを継ぐ男!

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for the final match. Kazuma of Team Japan vs. Shadow of Team America. Ja-pan vs. Go-pan. Who will win? And just how does Kazuma plan to reunite Pierrot with his parents with his bread?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atsumerareta Kyuukyoku no Shokuzai!! Shijousaidai no Kesshousen!
Les ingrédients ultimes ! La plus grande des finales !
The Ultimate Ingredients!! The Greatest Final Battle!
พาเหรดวัตถุดิบสุดยอด!! ศึกตัดสินครั้งใหญ่ในประวัติศาสตร์!
集められた究極の食材!! 史上最大の決勝戦!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma’s Ja-pan #61 has sent Pierrot back 23 years in time! Can Pierrot save his parents and alter the course of history? Or will he be doomed to a tragic life?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pierrot Transcends Time!! Ja-pan Becomes the Best in the World!?
Pierrot traverse le temps ! Le Ja-pan au sommet du monde !
Toki o Koeru Piero!! Japan Sekai no Chouten e!?
เปียโร่ข้ามกาลเวลา!! สู่จุดสุดยอดของโลกเจปัง!?
時を越えるピエロ!! ジャぱん世界の頂点へ!?

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Kirisaki has bought out Pantasia and merged it with St. Pierre! He then throws down to the gauntlet to Kazuma and the others by issuing them this challenge: If they want to save Pantasia, they must compete in his Yakitate 9 contest!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Challenged by Kirisaki!! A New Program, `Yakitate!! Nine,` Starts!
Kirisaki kara no Chousenjou! Shin Bangumi "Yakitate!! 9" Start
Le défi de Kirisaki ! Nouvelle émission : Yakitate 9 !
สารท้าดวลจากคิริซากิ! รายการใหม่แชมป์ขนมปัง 9 จังหวัด สตาร์ท
霧崎からの挑戦状! 新番組『焼きたて!!9』スタート

REGULAR.description:
The first opponent that Kazuma and the others face is the enigmatic Takumi Tsubozuka, a member of CMAP, a team of celebrity chefs. Can Kazuma, Kawachi, and Kanmuri come up with a bread that will defeat Tsubozuka and make use of Oma’s local ingredients?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel de pains régionaux ! Ce n`est qu`une star !
Local Bread Battle!! This Is Being an Idol!
Touchi Pan Taiketsu!! Nantettatte Idol!
ดวลขนมปังท้องถิ่น!! ไอด้อลอะไรกันนี่!
当地パン対決!! なんてったってアイドル!

REGULAR.description:
The bake-off has begun! Will Tsubozuka win with his charred tuna, or will Kazuma come from behind with his chawanmushi bread made with sea urchin?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awaken!! Super Kuroyanagi!
Mezameyo!! Super Kuroyanagi!
Transformation ! Super Kuroyanagi !
ตื่นขึ้นมาแล้ว!! ซูเปอร์คุโรยานางิ!
目覚めよ!! スーパー黒柳!

REGULAR.description:
After an accident, Kuroyanagi lost all sense of taste. Will he have to retire from being a judge forever? Meanwhile, Kazuma has to think of a way to defeat his old friend, Liu, in a match to make Chinese-style steamed buns!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ayaushi Kuroyanagi!! Ushinawareta Reaction!
Kuroyanagi en difficulté ! Réactions perdues !
Kuroyanagi in Trouble!! The Lost Reactions!
คุโรยานางิอันตราย!! รีแอคชั่นที่สูญเสียไป!
あやうし黒柳!! 失われたリアクション!

REGULAR.description:
Tsubozuka has become a friend of Kazuma and the others. But the other members of CMAP aren’t so forgiving. Now they’re dueling against Kazuma in Saito. How in the world can Kazuma beat three excellent bakers, and use a little clay haniwa statute to do it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oh, mango ! Les CMAP contre-attaquent!
Ooh, Mango!! CMAP`s Counterattack!
Uu, Mango!! CMAP no Dai Gyakushuu!
อื้อ แมงโก้!! การตอบโต้ของCMAP
ウー, マンゴー!! CMAPの大逆襲!

REGULAR.description:
CMAP not only has incredible knowledge and unbeatable talent, but one of their members even has the Arms of Flame, which burn even hotter than Kazuma’s Hands of the Sun! Will Kazuma’s love of good food and good friends be enough?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai [Love] wa Saito mo Sukuu!! Taiyou no Te VS Honoo no Ude!
L`amour fleurit à Saito ! Mains solaires contre bras ardents !
Love Will Save Even Saito! Hands of the Sun vs. Arms of Flame!
ความรักช่วยกอบกู้ไซโตะ!! หัตถ์ตะวัน V.S แขนอัคคี
愛[ラブ]は西都も救う!! 太陽の手VS炎の腕!

REGULAR.description:
A familiar pair returns, but something is different about them! Kazuma, Kawachi, and Kanmuri must do battle with a duo of ninjas using the local specialty of Omagari. Can Kazuma win even though both he and his opponent are using the same ingredients?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nin ! Nin ! Nin ! C`est mon Nindou !
Nin Nin Nin! My Way of the Ninja! Believe It!
Nin Nin Nin!! Ore no Nindou Dattebayo!
นินๆๆ นี่แหละวิถีนินจาของฉัน
ニンニンニン!! オレの忍道だってばよ!

REGULAR.description:
The ninjas are revealed to be Kai and Monica, and Kai makes a shocking declaration. If he can’t defeat Kazuma, he’ll commit suicide! Will his determination let him finally beat Kazuma? And will he really go through with it if he loses?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Hate Things That Are Twisted!! Kai and Monica`s Teamwork!
Je n`aime pas les courbes ! Le tandem Kai et Monika !
Magatta Koto ga Daikirai!! Kai to Monica no Ninin Sankyaku
เกลียดอะไรงอๆ ที่สุด!! ไคกับโมนิก้าวิ่ง 3 ขา
曲がったことが大キライ!! 戒とモニカの二人三脚

REGULAR.description:
Kanmuri’s past is brought to light and he may have to retire from his life as a baker! Will he be forced to leave his friends at Pantasia and become… a gangster!? And what’s worse, after getting sick, Kazuma has to sit this match out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanmuri no Himitsu!! Jingi naki Jam Taiketsu!
Kanmuri`s Secret!! A Jam Battle Without Honor!
Le secret de Kanmuri ! Un match qui part en confiture !
ความลับของคังมุริ!! ศึกแยมที่ไร้คุณธรรม
冠の秘密!! 仁義なきジャム対決!

REGULAR.description:
It’s a showdown between estranged brothers. Neither wants to succeed, because both love cooking. Will their thoughts reach their father?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brotherly Battle! The Top-Ranked Man Chosen by Father Is...!
Kyoudai Taiketsu!! Chichi ga Eranda Ichiryuu no Otoko!
Rivalité fraternelle ! La père choisit le meilleur !
ศึกของพี่น้อง!! ลูกผู้ชายตัวจริงที่พ่อเลือก!
兄弟対決!! 父が選んだ一流の男!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma is up against his most powerful foe yet, the famous TV celebrity and comedian Norihei Miki! Can Kazuma possibly compete against such a legend, especially when the theme involves using seaweed, Norihei’s specialty?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel de pains au nori ! Contre une célébrité !
Nori Bread Battle!! A Super Famous Celebrity Appears!
Nori Pan Taiketsu!! Chou Yumeijin ga Derun Desu yo!
ศึกขนมปังสาหร่าย!! คนดังโผล่มาแล้ว
海苔パン対決!! 超有名人が出るんですよ!

REGULAR.description:
It’s time for Kuroyanagi to decide who will win the sixth round: Kazuma or Norihei. Kuroyanagi delivers his most expressive reactions yet in a battle that leaves Kazuma and the others stunned!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Classic Taste! One Heart That Loves Japan!
Dentou no Aji!! Nippon o Omou Kokoro wa Hitotsu!
Goût traditionnel ! Le Japon est dans nos cœurs !
รสชาติต้นตำรับ!! จิตใจที่คำนึงถึงญี่ปุ่นมีหนึ่งเดียว
伝統の味!! 日本を想うココロはひとつ!

REGULAR.description:
Mokoyama has returned a changed man. Though he doesn’t wish to assist Yukino or Mr. Kirisaki in any way, he desperately wants to prove his worth by displaying his new form, Panda Man, and his new weapon, Super Baking Powder!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu no Revenge!! Panda Otoko, Arawaru!
Terrifying Revenge!! Panda Man Appears!
Ultime revanche ! Le retour de l`homme-panda !
การแก้แค้นอันน่ากลัว มนุษย์แพนด้ามาแล้ว
恐怖のリベンジ!! パンダ男, 現る!

REGULAR.description:
The hot springs battle is boiling over and things start getting really bombastic when Panda’s bread explodes… three times! How can this possibly be? Has Mokoyama made the bread he’s always dreamed of making?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Mushi Pan!! Panda ga Panda ni Natta Hi!
The Miraculous Steamed Bread!! The Day Panda Turned Into a Panda!
Un pain vapeur prodigieux ! Panda devient un vrai panda !
ขนมปังนึ่งปาฏิหารย์!! วันที่แพนด้ากลายเป็นแพนด้า
奇跡の蒸しパン!! パンダがパンダになった日!

REGULAR.description:
Tsukino’s sister steps in to challenge Kazuma and the others in the semi-finals, in a match she is well-suited for: making tarts. After insulting a local fruit vendor, Kazuma decides to fight against her using the vendor’s specialty, preserved loquats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le soleil contre la glace ! L`ultime duel de tartes !
Sun versus Blizzard!! The Ultimate Tart Match!
Taiyou VS Fubuki!! Kyuukyoku no Tart Taiketsu!
ตะวันปะทะพายุหิมะ
太陽VS吹雪!! 究極のタルト対決!

REGULAR.description:
Kazuma has been thrust into a fantasy world, and most take the “loquat” to the fires of a volcano and destroy it before the evil Snowza can use it to take over the world! This sounds an awful lot like a certain story about a ring…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est ma destinée ! Le Seigneur des Nèfles !
Is This My Path to Take!? The Lord of the Loquat!
Kore ga Watashi no Susumu Michi!? Lord of the Biwa!
นี่คือหนทางที่เราเลือกเดิน!? Lord of the บิวะ
これが私の進む道!? ロード・オブ・ザ・ビワ!

REGULAR.description:
The final showdown. Kazuma faces off against Yuichi Kirisaki’s son in a legendary battle in Kazuma’s own hometown. However, Kazuma won’t just have to win over Kuroyanagi - Yuichi Kirisaki and Pierrot also step up to the plate as judges!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A qui faire manger du bon pain ? Ja-pan, sois éternel !
Hontou ni Umai Pan o Tabesaseru no wa!? Japan yo, Eien ni!
Who Would You Serve Really Good Bread To!? Long Live Ja-pan!
คนที่จะให้ทานขนมปังอร่อยจริงๆ!? เจปัง Forever
本当に美味いパンを食べさせるのは!? ジャぱんよ, 永遠に!
